title: Mergent Online
description: Mergent Online provides company information for more than 12,000 U.S companies and 22,000 non-U.S. companies (covering 95% of the non-U.S. global market), including mergers and acquisitions information. Annual reports, real-time SEC filings, industry reports and executive biographies are available as well. Users can customize reports and set up e-mail alerts for company filings. An enhanced search interface to the U.S. government's SEC database (EDGAR) is available.
